casebody.data:
IN RE GRAND JURY SUBPOENA DUCES TECUM M-1421/1422 September Term 2017
081338 Supreme Court of New Jersey. July 6, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motions of Eric R. Perkin, Esquire, as Bankruptcy Trustee, for a stay pending appeal (M-1422) and for leave to appeal (M-1421) are denied.
